response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed over years of research and innovation. This product not only offers unparalleled performance but also comes with a suite of features that cater to various needs, making it a valuable asset for any organization or individual looking to enhance their capabilities. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, we're offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a high-value item at a premium rate, tailored specifically for individuals like yourself who appreciate top-tier solutions. We believe this investment will significantly contribute to your success and growth. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 15000}
